http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif ADULT-NUMERACY List ADULT-NUMERACY List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ADULT-NUMERACY&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ADULT-NUMERACY.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-02T13:45:39Z Steve Miller 2015-03-02T12:22:30-00:00 2015-03-02T12:22:30-00:00 Re: maths on radio 4 next monday morning https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;753057a7.1503 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>Hi Ruth<br><br>Thank you very much for the heads-up. I will contact the producer.<br><br>Best wishes<br>Steve<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: The UK Adult Numeracy discussion list<br>[mailto:ADULT-NUMERACY@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of ruth moulton<br>Sent: 02 March 2015 10:41<br>To: ADULT-NUMERACY@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: maths on radio 4 next monday morning [...] ruth moulton 2015-03-02T10:40:56+00:00 2015-03-02T10:40:56+00:00 maths on radio 4 next monday morning https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;41d8eeb8.1503 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>hi<br>just heard that next week's Start the Week - 9am mondays bbc radio 4 -<br>is about 'maths'<br><br>don't know what aspects or who the guests will be - but the programme is<br>usually worth listening to - thoughtful with interesting discussion -<br>and usually has the authors of at least one or two books about to be<br>published and one or two people involved in the arts [...] Graham Griffiths 2015-02-23T20:22:57+00:00 2015-02-23T20:22:57+00:00 ALM Webinar 3: Exploring the use of on-line digital resources to support family learning FEB 25th 12:30 GMT https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;20db3c30.1502 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>Please note the following...<br><br>Webinar 3<br><br>*Exploring the use of on-line digital resources to support family<br>learning *<br><br>The webinar will explore how on-line resources can contribute to<br>effective practice to support the development of parents\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd maths. It will<br>also signpost family learning practitioners/managers to two freely<br>available sets of online resources maths4us, sponsored by the UK<br>government, and new CBeebies, sponsored by the BBC. The presenters will<br>discuss how these, or similar resources, may be utilised in family<br>learning situations. [...] Clare Trott 2014-12-05T13:51:16+00:00 2014-12-05T13:51:16+00:00 one-day conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;f57d0c60.1412 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>Early Bird until 12th December<br><br>More Mist, Haze and Shutters<br>Wednesday 15th April 2015<br>Stewart Mason Building, Loughborough University<br><br>Following \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMist, Haze and Shutters: Dyscalculia in FE/HE\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd held at Loughborough University in April 2013, a similar one day conference will be held on Wednesday 15th April 2015. The focus will again be the FE/HE strand and the conference will explore mathematical learning difficulties associated with dyscalculia and other neurodiversities such as dyspraxia and dyslexia. [...] Graham Griffiths 2014-10-29T20:27:17+00:00 2014-10-29T20:27:17+00:00 Re: ITV Tonight - Trouble with numbers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;e0fcb1dd.1410 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>And if you didn't notice - it's actually ITV Tonight - tomorrow night not tonight. oops<br><br>Regards<br><br>Graham Griffiths<br>PGCE Mathematics with numeracy<br>g.griffiths@ioe.ac.uk Graham Griffiths 2014-10-29T15:37:21+00:00 2014-10-29T15:37:21+00:00 FW: ITV Tonight - Trouble with numbers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;41ed28ed.1410 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>Hi all. See below about the numeracy focus on itv tonight at 730. G<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: "Graham Griffiths" <g.griffiths@learningunlimited.co><br>Sent: \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd29/\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd10/\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd2014 15:36<br>To: "Graham Griffiths" <graham.griffiths@blueyonder.co.uk><br>Subject: FW: ITV Tonight - Trouble with numbers<br><br>From: Emma Haydon<br>Sent: \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd29/\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd10/\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd2014 10:38<br>To: Emma Haydon<br>Subject: ITV Tonight - Trouble with numbers [...] ruth moulton 2014-10-10T15:58:04+01:00 2014-10-10T15:58:04+01:00 Re: New Book for Adults with Numeracy Problems https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;b1191148.1410 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>hi stephen<br><br>thanks for this, i really like your approach in the extract - to take<br>something 'simple' such as counting, therefore hopefully not threatening<br>to read about, and use deliberate mistakes to show how anyone who can<br>count actually has skills that are non trivial!! which hopefully will<br>boost self confidence [...] Stephen Miller 2014-10-08T17:58:01+01:00 2014-10-08T17:58:01+01:00 New Book for Adults with Numeracy Problems https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;94c6dd22.1410 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;94c6dd22.1410">New Book for Adults with Numeracy Problems </a> Graham Griffiths 2014-08-22T11:15:03+01:00 2014-08-22T11:15:03+01:00 Citizen Maths MOOC for Level 2 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADULT-NUMERACY;2d50ad85.1408 DO NOT PRESS REPLY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF PEOPLE TO READ YOUR REPLY.<br><br>Hi all. I am involved in a new MOOC for Level 2 maths funded by UfI<br>http://citizenmaths.com/<br>you can see some information about this site on the funders website<br>http://www.ufi.co.uk/projects/citizen-maths and a news story on the<br>NCETM site here<br>https://www.ncetm.org.uk/news/45349.<br><br>At the moment the site deals with the 'powerful idea' of proportional<br>thinking and involves a number of scenarios and problems related to<br>multiplicative thinking (not just proportion) [...]
